headline.main: BIG GERMAN DRIVE DOUBTED; Stockholm Hears Nazis' Efforts May Be Largely Defensive

lead_paragraph: LONDON. June 1 (U.P.) -- Stockholm dispatches based on information from Berlin expressed doubt today that Germany would he able to essay its promised decisive offensive on the Russian front this Summer and suggested that instead the German command would engage in one or more powerful local offensives in small sectors such as Leningrad.
